dcterms:description: InLoc is an indoor visual localization dataset that provides a large-scale set of RGB images captured in two indoor scenes, enabling the evaluation of visual localization methods under challenging conditions.
dcterms:title: Inloc

dcterms:description: ScanNet is a richly-annotated RGB-D video dataset consisting of 2.5 million views across 1513 indoor scenes, providing camera poses and dense depth maps for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: Scannet
